vs t1s t2s t3s
ve t1e t2e t3e
t u v
ms

t10 = t1e - t1s
t11 = t10 * t
t1 = t11 + t1s
t20 = t2e - t2s
t21 = t20 * t
t2 = t21 + t2s
t30 = t3e - t3s
t31 = t30 * t
t3 = t31 + t3s
tri00 = t2 - t1
tri01 = tri00 * u
tri0 = tri01 + t1
tri10 = t3 - t1
tri11 = tri10 * v
tri = tri0 + tri11
w0 = ve - vs
w1 = w0 * t
w = w1 + vs
F = w - tri
C = F - ms
